mapper.insert: insert into center(cid, email, nanmmbyNm, nanmmbyNmAdmn, postAdres, telno, mnnstNm) values((select max(cid)+1 from center), #{email}, #{nanmmbyNm}, #{nanmmbyNmAdmn}, #{postAdres}, #{telno}, #{mnnstNm})
